response.overview: Its the summer after three bold teenage girls graduated from high school. Jess (Cindy Doan) plans a slumber party in their newly rented apartment; inviting current and ex-boyfriends, friends, foes, and an eccentric but vulgar egghead (Cory Chapman). As excited as each guest may be to face their long awaited desires they are unaware of what schemes lie ahead. After everyone's motives were exposed and/or backfired, all who attended turn to Jess in realization of the true reason why they were invited into one room simultaneously. There are tears, bombshells, and crazy obscenities that move the story along.  Jess is abrasive and doesn't care. Pier is a sweet girl but is eager to explore her sexuality. Brianna is a former nymphomaniac fighting her inner desires by finding herself in a new state of celibacy.
response.title: Foul Mouths: A Teenage Rage
